subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[revolve]]; to [[spin]]; to [[rotate]]
# {{surname|lang=zh|dot=:}} [[Wo]]
# {{lb|zh|Min Nan}} to [[change]] [[direction]]; to [[turn]]

subSections.text: {{zh-see|管|v|to take [[control]] of; to be [[in charge]] of}}
